## MultishiftPropGetters.getRemoveButtonProps() method

Gets the props to attach to a button that removes a selected item.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRemoveButtonProps<GElement extends HTMLElement = any>(options: GetRemoveButtonOptions<GElement, GItem>): GetRemoveButtonReturn<GElement>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>GetRemoveButtonOptions&lt;GElement, GItem&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`GetRemoveButtonReturn<GElement>`
